Articles.Content:
Long story short, the travel destinations of my tourists are simply not getting marked as I fulfill them

I have a "mun cruiser" with 11 seats (probe controlled) that orbits the mun with all my tourists that just want ti flyby or orbit the mun

The thing is, when I use it, they don't complete the quest, during suborbit they sub orbit checks don't get marked, same of orbit kerbin, flyby mun, and orbit mun

Nothing gets checked, and yes they are in the ship

And if I complete the mission with havks after I did what I was supposed to I just get the final pay, not the itinerary payment

Does anyone know a solution?
We'd need to know the cause before we can solve it @Edkopik, can you upload the save somewhere for us to test please.

@Edkopik

If you see a "checkmark" in the contract but the contract hasn't been completed, you might need to return the tourist to kerbin to complete the contract. Also, make sure you have the correct tourists aboard for that contract. 

Like @sal_vager said, we can't help much until we know a bit more.

Welcome to The Forum
